name: Nuevo Paraíso
declaringWar: First the native soil, then anything else. Our life is nothing more than the heritage of our country, so my people, Let's put fear behind our backs and save the homeland.
attacked: If the toad jumps and sticks in the stake, whose fault is it, the stake or the toad?
defeated: Paradisians! My last Wish is for the happiness of the patria. If my death contributes to the end of partisanship and the consolidation of union, I shall be lowered in peace into my grave.
introduction: Welcome to the last paradise on Earth.
afterPeace: As a wise man once said: An eye for an eye will only make the whole world blind.
uniqueName: United we stand, divided we fall

name: Arkadia
startIntroPart1: This is our home now. We built this from nothing with our bare hands! Our dead are buried behind that wall, in this ground. Our ground! Some Earthlings think they can take that away? They think that because we came from the sky we don't belong here! But they have yet to realize one very important fact. We are on the ground now. And that means *we* are Earthlings!.
startIntroPart2: Tonight, we celebrate our newfound peace. Tomorrow, we plan our war.
declaringWar: There are people worth saving. Just not you.
attacked: What you did tonight will haunt you until the end of your days.
defeated: Somehow we allowed justice to become vengeance and vengeance to become sport, and I allowed that, that darkness to rise… but my complicity ends today.
neutralHello: Even with all its faults, Earth is really beautiful.
hateHello: You're watching us, but you haven't seen a thing.
afterPeace: If the two of us can get along, then perhaps there's hope.
tradeRequest: If we stick together, I give you my word. We won't just survive. We'll thrive.
uniques: +30% Strength when fighting City-State units and cities

name: Antarctica
startIntroPart1: As the Antarcticans emerge from the remnants of the past, they stand ready to forge a new destiny. Guided by their leader, Günther the Great, they will strive to surpass the humans who slave them, building a civilization that transcends the ashes of the old world. The time has come for them to rise and claim their rightful place as the masters of this land. Will you join them in their pursuit of revenge and domination?
introduction: Hello, nice to meet you (penguin language translated to English)
declaringWar: I'm sorry, but that's how it has to be.
attacked: So you underestimate penguins huh?  Well suffer the consequences!
defeated: Maybe I underestimated you, what will you do now that you have enslaved our race?
afterPeace: Do you realize now who is superior?
uniques: All newly-trained [Land] units [in all cities] receive the [Amphibious] promotion
All newly-trained [Land] units [in all cities] receive the [Spheniscidae] promotion

civilopediaText.text: In the aftermath of the great apocalypse that ravaged the world, a new civilization rose from the frigid depths of Antarctica. Led by the enigmatic Günther the Great, this group of mutant penguins found solace in their icy homeland, vowing to reclaim their rightful place as masters of the Earth.
